.exit
npx hardhat run scripts/check-balance.js --network localhost
const WETH_ADDRESS = "0xC02aaA39b223FE8D0A0e5C4F27eAD9083C756Cc2"; const INTERPRETER_ADDRESS = "0xe55f53b29d5466302b5562e91847e24d0be1f7fa"; const weth = await ethers.getContractAt("IERC20", WETH_ADDRESS); const balance = await weth.balanceOf(INTERPRETER_ADDRESS); console.log(`Interpreter WETH balance is: ${ethers.formatEther(balance)} WETH`);
